| HistoryText             = '''Weapon III''' was part of the [[Weapon Plus (Earth-616)|Weapon Plus]]  program with hopes of creating super-soldiers.{{r|New X-Men #145}} While reports stated this phase additionally focused on animals.{{r|New X-Men #130}} 

The only subject revealed so far was a [[Homo sapiens|mutant]] named [[Harry Pizer (Earth-616)|Harry Pizer]]. He worked as a barrister during the [[Cold War]] with elastic and multi-sensory skin who had his powers augmented.{{r|Uncanny X-Force #22}}
